other_tests.findings: Thickening and retraction of the tricuspid valve leaflets, moderate to severe regurgitation, coherent with carcinoid heart disease.
Established the diagnosis of well differentiated NET G1.
Staging completed; revealed vertebral metastatic focus.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mark symptom improvement and stability of the lesions on initial scan; later found new vertebral metastasis.
